Greetings to Italian president of senate 
    Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, chairman of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Marcello Pera upon his election as president of the Italian senate.
 The message expressed the belief that the relations between the two parliaments would become closer and wished him great success in his responsible work.
